body:
Ok so basically here what we do is we tell what our goals in life are like what job you want,  where you want to live,  places you want to visit, what shape you want to be in,  what kind of car you want, if you want to own a business.  I'll go first but first I'd like to say sorry about my grammar and spelling and stuff like that I have mental disabilities so please don't hate.



I want to be a welder or pro paint ball place, I want to live here in Ontario or Nova Scotia in a normal size house, I want to visit most of my good friends I meet online, I want to be in peck physical condition I'm already working at it, I want a matte black 69 or 70 ss camera and that's all for me

I want to be a welder or pro paint ball place, I want to live here in Ontario or Nova Scotia in a normal size house, I want to visit most of my good friends I meet online, I want to be in peck physical condition I'm already working at it, I want a matte black 69 or 70 ss camera and that's all for me

I wanna be either an architect or 3d model artist

Id like to live somewhere up North, like Canada or upstate New York. I like the cold, it matches my attitude. :D

Id like to visit China. Das bout it :)
